last_episode_to_air.name: La Bikina
last_episode_to_air.overview: After Patricio deceives him, Luis Miguel retaliates. Flashing forward, Micky prepares for a comeback concert and finally reaches out to his daughter.

name: Luis Miguel: The Series
overview: The series dramatizes the life story of Mexican superstar singer Luis Miguel, who has captivated audiences in Latin America and beyond for decades.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As his career skyrockets, Luis Miguel struggles with his family life amidst a string of betrayals, heartbreaking revelations and a crushing loss.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: While overcoming personal struggles, Luis Miguel contemplates sharing his life story. In the 90s, he strikes up a relationship with Mariah Carey.

episodes.name: Cuando calienta el sol
episodes.overview: Luis Rey, the father of Luis Miguel discovers the enormous talent of his son at 10 years old and is responsible for managing his career and personal life. While, Micky meets his first love, Mariana Yazbek.

episodes.name: The malagueña
episodes.overview: As the press get wind of Luis Miguel's talk with Hugo, his dad tries to get him a duet with Michael Jackson. Flashbacks recall Luis Miguel's TV debut.

episodes.name: Yo que no vivo sin tí
episodes.overview: Luis Miguel begs his record label to let him try a new pop sound, and celebrates his 18th birthday. Back in 1981, Luisito Rey asks too much of Marcela.

episodes.name: Culpable o no
episodes.overview: Jealousy threatens to destroy Luis Miguel and Mariana's relationship. Alex feels betrayed by his brother after finding a postcard from their mother.

episodes.name: La chica del bikini azul
episodes.overview: Luis Miguel's hard-partying ways end up putting an infatuated fan in serious danger. Financial issues call into question his dad's business practices.

episodes.name: Mamá, Mamá
episodes.overview: The singer endures basic training at a military college in order to film there, and learns about responsibility. Alex searches for their mom in Italy.

episodes.name: La incondicional
episodes.overview: In the midst of financial troubles because of his father, Luis Miguel travels to Italy to help Alex search for their mother and discovers several lies.

episodes.name: Alguien como tú
episodes.overview: Luisito Rey starts a new record label. While trying to determine what to do about his owed taxes, Luis Miguel travels to Aspen with a frustrated Alex.

episodes.name: Todo el amor del mundo
episodes.overview: An investigator looks into Marcela's disappearance. Luis Miguel grows frustrated with reporters' questions about his father, who debuts a new singer.

episodes.name: Decídete
episodes.overview: After a breakthrough in the search for his mother, Luis Miguel must decide how to proceed. In 1985, tensions run high during a family reunion in Italy.

episodes.name: Marcela
episodes.overview: A financially destitute Luisito Rey begins running out of options. Érika and Fede argue over Luis Miguel. In 1986, Marcela gets serenaded onstage.

episodes.name: No me platiques más
episodes.overview: The truth about Luis Miguel's birthplace threatens to destroy his career just as he's trying to release a new album of classic Mexican songs.

episodes.name: No me puedes dejar así
episodes.overview: As his father's medical condition worsens, Luis Miguel grows desperate for what could be his last opportunity to find out what happened to his mother.

episodes.name: Qué nivel de mujer
episodes.overview: In 1992, a desperate Luis Miguel goes to great lengths to discover the truth about his mother's disappearance while also fighting for custody of Sergio.

episodes.name: Noche de paz
episodes.overview: Luis Miguel is delivered devastating news about his health in 2005. Years earlier, Hugo advises the singer not to be consumed by his search for Marcela.

episodes.name: Suave
episodes.overview: Micky's competitive jealousy threatens to upend his relationship with his family. Many years later, he hopes to make amends with his estranged daughter.

episodes.name: Ayer
episodes.overview: Micky struggles to balance filming his "Ayer" music video with spending time with Michelle. In the future, the father-daughter duo faces new challenges.

episodes.name: Come Fly With Me
episodes.overview: The possibility of a duet with Frank Sinatra brings Luis Miguel to New York, but back home, tragedy strikes. In 2006, he attempts to sing again.

episodes.name: El día que me quieras
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by grief, Micky asks his feuding songwriters to join him in Acapulco. Patricio makes a calculated move. In 2006, Susana heads to Peru.

episodes.name: Todo y nada
episodes.overview: Luis Miguel is conflicted about whether to believe Mauricio. Years before, the singer tried to deter Sergio from going pro too young. Érika moved in.

episodes.name: Historia de amor
episodes.overview: In 1994, Luis Miguel faces tough decisions involving many of his loved ones. While 2007 starts to feel more stable, a shock is around the corner.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As his career skyrockets, Luis Miguel struggles with his family life amidst a string of betrayals, heartbreaking revelations and a crushing loss.

episodes.name: Sueña
episodes.overview: In 1995, Micky attempts to woo Mariah Carey. Patricio takes financial risks. Years later, the singer struggles to overcome his demons.

episodes.name: Cómo es posible que a mi lado
episodes.overview: Luis Miguel faces tough decisions amid a legal battle. In the past, Mauricio starts working for Micky just as Patricio handles a plagiarism claim.

episodes.name: Por debajo de la mesa
episodes.overview: Mauricio hopes to repair the relationship between Micky and his daughter. In the 90s, with Mariah's help, the singer is offered a chance to play Zorro.

episodes.name: Sabor a mí
episodes.overview: Amid personal struggles, Luis Miguel contemplates making a movie about his life. Years earlier, Micky's jealousy creates conflict with Mariah.

episodes.name: Amante del amor
episodes.overview: Mariah and Micky's relationship is on the rocks as they record a duet together. Decades later, Micky tells filmmakers anecdotes about his parents.

episodes.name: La Bikina
episodes.overview: After Patricio deceives him, Luis Miguel retaliates. Flashing forward, Micky prepares for a comeback concert and finally reaches out to his daughter.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: While overcoming personal struggles, Luis Miguel contemplates sharing his life story. In the 90s, he strikes up a relationship with Mariah Carey.
